about_the_game:
TAKE CONTROL OF THIS CUBE

This cube is on the move! It has a mission: traverse the sprawling world before it in its journey to reunite with its cube-shaped friends. Use your mouse to help it navigate the treacherous paths ahead—filled with challenging hazards that will test your patience. The cube is fragile and does not take kindly to the plethora of spiky obstacles in its way. Fortunately, through the use of precise timing and clever movement, you can ensure its safety by avoiding these dangerous foes.


MAKE THE BEST OF YOUR MOVES

With a limited number of moves on each level, you’ll have to approach each area methodically as you identify patterns and consider the best way forward. Some paths are more efficient than others—you’ll have to determine which ones make the best use of your precious moves—otherwise you’ll run out of moves before you can complete the level!


CONQUER CUBE CONUNDRUMS

You’ll run into a variety of devices and machines that will enrich your cube maneuvering experience. You can expect to be introduced to many new things as you progress through each world. Whether you’re being launched through the air or descending an elevator into a pit of spike-filled madness, you will always be looking for new ways to improve your cube controlling strategies.


NAVIGATE EYE-CATCHING WORLDS

Enjoy the vibrant sights of sixty hand-crafted levels across six unique worlds, each with their own distinctive theme and character. Take in the atmosphere of your surroundings as you puzzle out each level. From mysterious technological landscapes to fields of ancient crystal and slime, there will always be wondrous spectacles waiting for you.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.3 GHz or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 200 series or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 @ 2.6 GHz or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600 series or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 200 series or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Cube Control

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.3 GHz or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 200 series or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600 series or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: Help a lone cube navigate through sixty electrifying levels in this isometric puzzle-adventure game. Carefully manage the use of your limited moves in order to complete each level successfully, all while avoiding dangerous obstacles through careful timing and creative movement choices.
